response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
